mapper.select: select r.resume_id, r.title, r.education, r.career, u.address from resume_tb r join user_tb u on r.user_id = u.user_id where r.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT r.resume_id, u.photo, u.name, r.title, u.birth, r.education, r.career, u.address FROM USER_TB u join resume_tb r on u.user_id = r.user_id where r.state = 1

SELECT distinct r.resume_id, u.photo, u.name, r.title, u.birth, r.education, r.career, u.address, r.content, r.link, ( select comp_scrap_id from comp_scrap_tb where resume_id = r.resume_id ) comp_scrap_id FROM USER_TB u join resume_tb r on u.user_id = r.user_id where r.state = 1 and r.resume_id = #{resumeId}
mapper.insert: insert into resume_tb ( user_id, title, content, education, career, link, state, created_at ) values ( #{rDto.userId}, #{rDto.title}, #{rDto.content}, #{rDto.education}, #{rDto.career}, #{rDto.link}, #{rDto.state}, now())
mapper.update: update resume_tb set title = #{rDto.title}, content = #{rDto.content}, education = #{rDto.education}, career = #{rDto.career}, link = #{rDto.link}, state = #{rDto.state}, created_at = #{rDto.createdAt} where resume_id = #{rDto.resumeId}
